1.png.action: go right 1 meter — bad action - lost target
1.png.description: The Rubik's cube is partially visible on the right side of the image. Moving right will bring it more into view and closer to the center.
The Rubik's cube is partially visible near the bottom center of the image. Moving up will help bring it more into view and center it in the frame.

2.png.action: target lost — return to previous position and try a different direction
2.png.description: The Rubik's cube is not visible in the current image.

3.png.action: go straight 1 meter — bad action - lost target
3.png.description: The Rubik's cube is visible on the table in front of the couch. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it centered in the frame.
The Rubik's cube is partially visible on the table to the left. Moving right will help center it in the frame and bring it closer.

4.png.action: target lost — return to previous position and try a different direction
4.png.description: The Rubik's cube is not visible in the current image.

5.png.action: go right 1 meter — bad action - lost target
5.png.description: The Rubik's cube is partially visible on the left side of the image. Moving right will help center it in the frame.
